divs: Sighting DetailsNight before last, Saturday night (07-25-2009), about 10:30 p.m. I was at the sink washing dishes, the TV had a few quick interruptions, didn���t lose contact, though. I went outside, and very low on the horizon, in the trees and just above and below the hills from my house was a flashing light. It was too low and too obscured by trees and hills to see, but it was a light of some sort at the same time my TV had brief interference. I could only barely see the light moving west for about 7 seconds - couldn���t see it well enough to say if it was a plane, etc. But no noise.
